sentences.en: ...Ian Fleming, the creator of James Bond.
sentences.cn: …伊恩·弗莱明，詹姆斯·邦德的创作者。

sentences.en: As the creator of Tom Joad , he chronicled Depression - era misery.
sentences.cn: 作为汤姆·约德的创造者, 他记录了大萧条中的苦难生活.

sentences.en: Because God is the Creator, he also the owner of all things.
sentences.cn: 因为神是造物主, 所以他也是万物的拥有者.

sentences.en: Dilbert creator Scott Adams does as a good a job as anyone.
sentences.cn: 呆伯特创作者斯科特亚当斯和其他人做得一样好.

sentences.en: For mind is the only creator, and thought is the only energy.
sentences.cn: 因为意识是唯一的创造者, 而思想是唯一的能量来源.

sentences.en: I have always believed that a garden dies with its creator.
sentences.cn: 我一直认为花园的灵魂是与其创造者共存亡的。

sentences.en: In this way, you can come back to Prime Creator.
sentences.cn: 以这条道路, 你们能返回到最初的创造者.

sentences.en: It establishes, beyond debate, those gifts of the Creator.
sentences.cn: 它毫无疑义地确立了造物主所给予人类的那些礼物.

sentences.en: Its young creator dreams of a store that sells everything.
sentences.cn: 年轻的创始人梦想一家无-所不售的商店.

sentences.en: The Bible tells us the creator God also has a name.
sentences.cn: 圣经告诉我们天地的创造主也有名字.

sentences.en: The three main god figures are Brahma the creator, Vishnu the preserver and Siva the destroyer.
sentences.cn: 三个主要的神是创造之神梵天 、 守护之神毗湿奴和破坏之神湿婆.

sentences.en: They eventually settled on J . J . Abrams, the creator of the TV spy show, Alias.
sentences.cn: 他们最后选定J. J. 亚伯拉罕, 也就是电影集《双面女间谍》的制片.

sentences.en: Walt Disney, the creator of Mickey Mouse
sentences.cn: 沃尔特∙迪斯尼—米老鼠的创作者

sentences.en: We recognize that God, our Creator, is the source of all truth.
sentences.cn: 我们认识上帝, 我们的创作者, 是真理的源头.

sentences.en: Who is the creator of the Modern Olympic Games?
sentences.cn: 现代奥运会的创始人是谁?

words.tran_cn: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

trans.tran_en: someone who made or invented a particular thing
